t: Amazon.com: LEGEND[2 LP]: CDs & Vinyl
s: Multiplatinum artist and EGOT-winner John Legend released his 8th studio album, LEGEND, in 2022 via Republic Records. The double album features Saweetie, Rick Ross, Muni Long, Jazmine Sullivan, Rapsody, Ledisi, Jhene Aiko, Ty Dolla $ign, and more.

t: Legend, John - Evolver [Vinyl] - Amazon.com Music
s: It could be just me...Legend even does a little run at the end of the song that sounds like Teddy Riley. "Everybody Knows" is such a sweet song. It talks of working on relationships and the hardships and puzzlement that it brings. "Quickly" takes it to a pop level with a long-time, no-hear artist, Brandy...

t: Legend, John - Get Lifted - Amazon.com Music
s: Bought 'Get Lifted' on vinyl, and it was totally worth it. Arrived brand new, no issues at all. Put it on the turntable, and instantly, just...wow. Forgot how many incredible tracks are on this album. It's been playing non-stop since I got it. The sound quality is fantastic, warm and full. Really brings out the soul in his music. If you're a John Legend ...

t: Amazon.com: DARKNESS AND LIGHT: CDs & Vinyl
s: The lead single is the anthemic track, "Love Me Now," written and produced by John Legend with Blake Mills and John Ryan (One Direction). The next chapter of John Legend's continually building career is Darkness And Light.
